entry.title: Burning House
entry.summary:
Author: Yes_I_have_daddy_issues

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,383Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 35

Summary: We were kids together, growing up in the same crime ridden alleyways and neighborhoods, just two doors down the road from each other. “I’ll find a way.” he turned back to face me, a big smile stretching across his face, one I would never forget, the light in his eyes visible.I never saw Jason again after that night. Not in person at least.On the news, getting adopted by Bruce Wayne of all people, waving and smiling to the cameras, it never reached his eyes the way his smile always did when we were younger.Then he vanished for good.

entry.title: What A Girl Wants.
entry.summary:
Author: blairwitchprcject

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 373Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 1

Summary: Ivy Wallace is palming through the dark, trying to find the switch and be able to see who she really is. She can’t, because even if her mother loves her to the point of madness, she’s missing the other half.Her father.Since Ivy has use of memory she’s been waiting for the day he comes, a knight— like her mother called him. But the days pass and then years and suddenly Ivy is eighteen and totally, absolutely, lost. She’s drowning on land.And so she buys a ticket to Gotham to find the man who’s responsible for that missing half of her. Ivy Wallace doesn’t have a clue of what she’s gotten into!

entry.title: Dear Daddy Long Legs
entry.summary:
Author: AthenaGC94

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 100,086Chapters: 32/32Kudos: 1,390

Summary: “I’m looking for an application for a scholarship.”“You didn’t have to hack our systems to apply for a scholarship,” Tim deadpanned, “I wasn’t aware you could go to college if you’re legally dead.”His eye twitched. “I’m looking for an applicant,” he amended, “She already applied.”Tim finally looked at him. “She?”_____Inspired by the novel Daddy Long Legs by Jean Webster. Jason Todd saves you from getting mugged one night and ends up being your mysterious benefactor, funding your college experience. Featuring awkward "zero rizz" Jason Todd and several members of the Bat Family.Jason Todd x Fem!Reader - does not use y/n

entry.title: Cartoon logic
entry.summary:
Author: FearTheHime

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,516Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 45

Summary: "Why does everything have to be so boring and a letdown?"When stuff happens, people say forgive and forget, to be the bigger person and all the fruity shit like that. [M/N] tried that, he tried to be nice and tried to be resume his life. But he couldn't brutally robbed of his future by Spider-Man, New York's favorite hero. Accidental and left [M/N] with limp and chronic pain that made his life in sufferable, as his dreams were sliced in half and forced onto a different path. How he would give so much to be able to live again without pain, without stress and pressure.To be free and get what he desires most. But that's not how life works and [M/N] is forced to be content with it.Until he finds a mask."I'm green and mean and not a fighting machine~!"
